Back to the list

Mixins

To speed up your development process in SCSS you can use mixins. These are really useful shortcodes to add in your SCSS elements.

File to include

@include "mixins";

How to use them

Name
Effect
Variables
Example

flexbox

Add a flexbox.

$align, $justify, $wrap

@include flexbox(center, center, nowrap);

shadow

Add a shadow.

$color

@include shadow($primary);

shadow-invert

Add a shadow on the top.

$color

@include shadow-invert($primary);

outline

Add an outline.

$size-border, $color

@include outline(.5px, $gray);

transition

Add transitions.

$property, $duration, $function

@include transition(max-height, .5s, ease-out);

transform

Add a transform property.

$method

@include transform(rotate(90deg));

transform origin

Add a transform origin property.

$method

@include transform-origin(center);

appearance

Add an appearance property.

$value

@include appearance(none);

border-radius

Add a border-radius.

$value

@include border-radius(5px);

box-sizing

Add a box-sizing property.

$property

@include box-sizing(border-box);

icon

Add an icon from Fajny CSS icon font.

$unicode

@include icon("\eab9");
